name: Drapion
description: It’s so vicious that it’s called the Sand Demon. Yet when confronted by Hippowdon, Drapion keeps a low profile and will never pick a fight.

attacks.name: Hard Press
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Toxic Strike
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.
